com.defano.jmonet.tools.base

Interface StaticTransformer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSelectionTool, AbstractTransformTool, LassoTool, RotateTool, SelectionTool, SlantTool

    public interface StaticTransformer

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void flipHorizontal()
      Flips or mirrors the selected image along its vertical axis.
      void flipVertical()
      Flips or mirrors the selected image along its horizontal axis.
      void rotateLeft()
      Rotates the selected image 90 degrees counter-clockwise.
      void rotateRight()
      Rotates the selected image 90 degrees clockwise.

    • Method Detail

      • rotateLeft

        void rotateLeft()
        Rotates the selected image 90 degrees counter-clockwise.

      • rotateRight

        void rotateRight()
        Rotates the selected image 90 degrees clockwise.

      • flipHorizontal

        void flipHorizontal()
        Flips or mirrors the selected image along its vertical axis. That is, all pixels on the left side of the image will move the right side and vice versa.

      • flipVertical

        void flipVertical()
        Flips or mirrors the selected image along its horizontal axis. That is, all pixels on the top of the image will move to the bottom and vice versa.
